CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please select one (or more) of the scheduling method you plan to utilize.
CustomField.label: Scheduling Method

value.fullName: I do not plan to utilize any of the listed scheduling method
value.label: I do not plan to utilize any of the listed scheduling method

value.fullName: Device(s) installed in the soil (moisture blocks, tensiometers, C-probes, etc.)
value.label: Device(s) installed in the soil (moisture blocks, tensiometers, C-probes, etc.)

value.fullName: Evaporation pan or other similar based ET device (UGA EASY Pan)
value.label: Evaporation pan or other similar based ET device (UGA EASY Pan)

value.fullName: Written records of rainfall and crop use (ie. checkbook method)
value.label: Written records of rainfall and crop use (ie. checkbook method)
